Monster stat gains dropped drastically?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Monster stat gains dropped drastically?
By Darkling on Wednesday, November 7, 2012 - 11:59 am:

My Sandy, (Monol/Suezo) is only 1 year and 10 months old, and it has suddenly dropped from +7-10 on defense training, to a mere 3-5.

I noticed this when I just finished an expedition (only 1 month ago) and I tried to rest, and then do some training as usual, but his stat gains all dropped to an un-reasonable level...

I also noticed this on my Poison (Pixie/???) and it was only 2-3 years old.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 8, 2012 - 09:14 am:

Either you're having a bad run of luck, try replaying a week over and over and see what happens, or you've drastically shortened its lifespan.

By Darkling on Friday, November 9, 2012 - 10:04 am:

Yes, I actually found out a month later that it was ready to retire, so I just combined it with an arrowhead and have now trained an arrowhead to 4 years.

I actually didn't realize how often it went through stress (It was atleast once a month.) I have worked on managing stress a lot more with my arrowhead.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 9, 2012 - 10:40 pm:

Yeah, you might want to try a method...
